participant_abstract.sent: Each of the members provided a presentation to present their findings, decisions and suggestions.
A quick brainstorming session was conducted in order to decide on the actual functions of the remote control and design of buttons.
The meeting was closed and further tasks were appointed.

participant_actions.sent: Fill in questionnaire, lunch break, 30 min personal work until next meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: What buttons to have and design (me: do they meet user requirements?).
Technical design (industrial designer's decisions: chips, transmitting devices, where, buzzer, radio etc.).
What to exclude (no teletext, no dvd or vcr/vhs).

participant_problems.sent: What to do next not very clear.
